comments.text:
Deps may be off between clean targets and/or conditionals may be needed to inhibit generation during clean.  The clobber target also exhibits this behavior but not yet sure if this is a clean or rebuild-cleanly target.  If the sandbox is empty or in a partially clean state there should be no need to run configure.


% make -f client.mk distclean
  o configure target will be invoked even within a clean sandbox
  o one-off problem, make distclean may need to be run twice to exhibit the behavior.

% make -f client.mk clean
  o immediately after distclean finishes invoke 'make clean' and configure will be run a 2nd time.
